# AlertConfiguration

**Structure**

A structure you use to configure an alert that appears when you update your Live Activity.

## Declaration

```swift
struct AlertConfiguration
```

## Configuring Live Activity alerts

- **init(title:body:sound:)**: Initializes a new alert configuration for a Live Activity update.
- **title**: A short title that describes the purpose of the Live Activity update on Apple Watch.
- **body**: The main text that appears on the alert for a Live Activity update on Apple Watch.
- **sound**: The sound the system plays when the Live Activity alert appears on a person’s device.
- **AlertConfiguration.AlertSound**: An object that describes the sound to play for a Live Activity update alert.

## Updating a Live Activity

- **update(_:)**: Updates the dynamic content of the Live Activity.
- **update(_:alertConfiguration:)**: Updates the dynamic content of a Live Activity and alerts a person about the Live Activity update.
- **update(_:alertConfiguration:timestamp:)**: Updates the dynamic content of a Live Activity and alerts a person about the Live Activity update.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
